item.description:
That's right, it's the first Annual Hookah Happy Hour!

We will try some place new and head to Mediterranea.

This place is BYO so you can make your own drink specials. There is great Meditteranean (and good Italian) food too if you want to grab something to eat.

And if you have never Hookahed, now is your chance. If you are not into smokey places, don't worry, the Hookahs are not very smokey and there is always a front room for mingling which is usually completely smoke free.

Otherwise, we will see you in the back hookah lounge!

http://www.mediterran...
item.name: Hookah Happy Hour - Mediterraneo
